Cerebral palsy frequently associate neurologic abnormality mental retardation . Improvements neonatal intensive care result improved survival low birthweight infant also increase frequency cerebral palsy . Prematurity lead risk factor cerebral palsy . DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Consecutive patient admit diagnosis preterm labor/contractions PROM . `` Preterm labor/contractions '' define : 1. gestational age : 2036 week ; 2. intact membrane ; 3. regular uterine contraction great equal 8 60 minute . Preterm PROM define : 1. gestational age 2036 week ; 2. spontaneous rupture membrane diagnose sterile speculum examination confirm pool amniotic fluid vagina , positive Nitrazine test result , positive ferning test result . In case suspect unconfirmed preterm PROM , indigo carmin instillation perform . The vaginal leakage indigo carmin confirm diagnosis case .
